titles.title: NLRB Freeze Act of 2013
A bill to delay the enforcement of any rulings of the National Labor Relations Board until there is a final resolution in pending lawsuits.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 1/30/2013--Introduced. NLRB Freeze Act of 2013 - Declares that determinations made by National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) members constituting a quorum shall be void until a final judgment is entered in all cases pending before a federal court challenging the constitutionality of the appointment of Board members during a recess of the Senate.
